title:
Hello, 

 I have read that the former manager of the ABC stores, {Billy Williams} was found guilty of a crime, has filed an appeal. 

 When would his court date be and will Star News give us news about the outcome?

 And is it true that he has until 2015 to pay his fine?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16232
